name: Simona Samardjiska
content: Simona Samardjiska personal page About me I am an assistant professor in the Digital Security Group at Radboud University, The Netherlands. I joined the Digital Security Group as a postdoc in 2017. Previously, I was an assistant professor at the Faculty of Computer Science and Engineering, ``Ss. Cyril and Methodius'' University, Skopje, Macedonia from 2015-2017. I received my PhD from the Norwegian University of Science and Technology in Trondheim in 2015. I did my PhD under the supervision of prof. Danilo Gligoroski on the topic of Multivariate cryptography. I hold a masters degree in computer science and university diploma in pure mathematics, both obtained from the Faculty of Natural Sciences and Mathematics, ``Ss. Cyril and Methodius'' University, Skopje, Macedonia. Latest News MQDSS website is up! 08 Aug 2018
